name: Dreams Lost.
description:
---CONTROLS---

  • Move: WASD, Arrow Keys, Left Stick, or D-Pad
  • Jump: Space or Xbox Pad A
  • Attack: F or Xbox Pad B
  • Interact: E or Xbox Pad X
  • Use item/ability: T or Xbox Pad Y
  • Cycle through abilities: - and =, Left Shoulder and Right Shoulder

---CREDITS---

Music and Sound: https://www.quietbellstudio.com/

Raw Photographs: https://unsplash.com/

Unity Tools: https://yarnspinner.dev/ and https://arongranberg.com/astar/

===

It was cool to see how much I could accomplish in a month — even if the result isn't all that I hoped it to be. Never having made a game before, it's to be expected. I'm uncertain if I'll ever come back to this project or if it will remain as a learning experience. Either way, I look forward to improving and making more games in the future!

This demo itself is completely free, but if you'd like to show your support monetarily, consider donating to a charity that's important to me. It's thanks to many Ukrainian people and resources that this game was possible.  https://help.gov.ua/en/
